name: mcp-agent-proxy
description: MCP proxy server that allows MCP clients to communicate with agent servers (Mastra, LangGraph, etc.)

scripts.build: tsup src/mcp-server.ts --format esm,cjs --out-dir dist --dts --clean && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - dist/mcp-server.js > temp && mv temp dist/mcp-server.js && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - dist/mcp-server.cjs > temp && mv temp dist/mcp-server.cjs
scripts.validate:quick: echo 'ðŸ”¨ Building...' && pnpm build && echo 'âœ… Build complete' && echo 'ðŸ§ª Running tests...' && pnpm test && echo 'âœ… Tests complete' && echo 'ðŸ” Checking lint...' && pnpm lint && echo 'âœ… Lint complete' && echo 'ðŸ’Ž Checking format...' && pnpm format:check && echo 'âœ… Format complete'
scripts.validate:full: echo 'ðŸ”¨ Building...' && pnpm build && echo 'âœ… Build complete' && echo 'ðŸ§ª Running unit tests...' && pnpm test && echo 'âœ… Unit tests complete' && echo 'ðŸ” Checking lint...' && pnpm lint && echo 'âœ… Lint complete' && echo 'ðŸ’Ž Checking format...' && pnpm format:check && echo 'âœ… Format complete' && echo 'ðŸ§ª Running integration tests...' && pnpm test:integration && echo 'âœ… Integration tests complete'
scripts.validate:ci: pnpm validate:full && echo 'ðŸ“Š Generating coverage...' && pnpm test:coverage && echo 'âœ… Coverage complete' && echo 'ðŸ§¹ Checking for dead code...' && pnpm deadcode && echo 'âœ… Dead code check complete'
scripts.mcp:test: echo 'ðŸ”Œ Testing MCP Protocol Compliance...' && pnpm build && timeout 30 node dist/mcp-server.js --http &> /dev/null & SERVER_PID=$! && sleep 2 && echo 'Testing initialize...' && curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3001/mcp -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -H 'Accept: text/event-stream' -d '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":"1","method":"initialize","params":{"protocolVersion":"2024-11-05","capabilities":{"tools":{}},"clientInfo":{"name":"test-client","version":"1.0.0"}}}' && echo 'Testing tools/list...' && sleep 1 && curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3001/mcp -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -H 'Accept: text/event-stream' -d '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":"2","method":"tools/list","params":{}}' && kill $SERVER_PID 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.security:test: echo 'ðŸ”’ Testing Security Features...' && pnpm build && timeout 30 node dist/mcp-server.js --http &> /dev/null & SERVER_PID=$! && sleep 2 && echo 'Testing invalid origin (should fail)...' && curl -s -w '%{http_code}' -X POST http://localhost:3001/mcp -H 'Origin: https://evil-site.com' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' && echo '' && echo 'Testing valid localhost origin (should succeed)...' && curl -s -w '%{http_code}' -X POST http://localhost:3001/mcp -H 'Origin: http://localhost:3000' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -H 'Accept: text/event-stream' -d '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":"1","method":"initialize","params":{"protocolVersion":"2024-11-05","capabilities":{"tools":{}},"clientInfo":{"name":"test-client","version":"1.0.0"}}}' && echo '' && kill $SERVER_PID 2>/dev/null || true
